result.name: v0.4.13 CLI app and many features & fixes
result.description:
## What's Changed
* fix: compileLHS for subscript and attribute by @lihebi in https://github.com/codepod-io/codepod/pull/311
* fix: check status of loading google oauth script by @lihebi in https://github.com/codepod-io/codepod/pull/313
* Feat: Fork a Repo by @li-xin-yi in https://github.com/codepod-io/codepod/pull/312
* Add gallery in README.md by @forrestbao in https://github.com/codepod-io/codepod/pull/320
* Remove reactflow attribution by @lihebi in https://github.com/codepod-io/codepod/pull/325
* fix: dirty status on repo initial loading by @lihebi in https://github.com/codepod-io/codepod/pull/326
* feat: add jump between pods by @lihebi in https://github.com/codepod-io/codepod/pull/327
* Updated layout and added auto hide for output menu options by @chimmyten in https://github.com/codepod-io/codepod/pull/329
* revise README by @forrestbao in https://github.com/codepod-io/codepod/pull/334
* trigger auto-layout when auto-layout setting is toggled on by @chimmyten in https://github.com/codepod-io/codepod/pull/339
* stylize output box options by @forrestbao in https://github.com/codepod-io/codepod/pull/336
* [UI] Apply "Show Line Numbers" as toggle switch in sidebar by @senwang86 in https://github.com/codepod-io/codepod/pull/341
* move dev manual to codepod.io repo by @lihebi in https://github.com/codepod-io/codepod/pull/342
* fix content loss caused by `dirty` status override by @lihebi in https://github.com/codepod-io/codepod/pull/344
* fix remirror toolbar position when panning on canvas by @lihebi in https://github.com/codepod-io/codepod/pull/346
* refine editor toolbar appearance by @lihebi in https://github.com/codepod-io/codepod/pull/347
* use :8080 port by default by @lihebi in https://github.com/codepod-io/codepod/pull/348
* move website to the main repo by @lihebi in https://github.com/codepod-io/codepod/pull/349
* update docs for changing port to :8080 by @lihebi in https://github.com/codepod-io/codepod/pull/352
* [UI] Jupyter Notebook export in Frontend by @senwang86 in https://github.com/codepod-io/codepod/pull/343
* fix: [UI] add confirm delete repo dialog by @sumtsui in https://github.com/codepod-io/codepod/pull/353
* [UI][Fix] Fix the Remirror export initialization by @senwang86 in https://github.com/codepod-io/codepod/pull/356
* Feat: AI Code AutoCompletion with Codeium Support by @li-xin-yi in https://github.com/codepod-io/codepod/pull/328
* chore: filter keys in the beginning of useJump by @lihebi in https://github.com/codepod-io/codepod/pull/358
* fix: two console errors from #328 by @lihebi in https://github.com/codepod-io/codepod/pull/359
* use one global instance of Prisma client by @lihebi in https://github.com/codepod-io/codepod/pull/362
* docs: DB schema migration by @lihebi in https://github.com/codepod-io/codepod/pull/363
* chore: enhance delete repo UX by @sumtsui in https://github.com/codepod-io/codepod/pull/364
* cleanup: prod configs (docker and k8s) by @lihebi in https://github.com/codepod-io/codepod/pull/361
* [Fix] Specific error message for Codeium verification failure  by @li-xin-yi in https://github.com/codepod-io/codepod/pull/370
* [UI] Import Jupyter notebook  by @senwang86 in https://github.com/codepod-io/codepod/pull/369
* fix: sx not an object warning by @lihebi in https://github.com/codepod-io/codepod/pull/372
* [UI] Allow importing the Python script by @senwang86 in https://github.com/codepod-io/codepod/pull/374
* fix: unit test tree-sitter loading by @lihebi in https://github.com/codepod-io/codepod/pull/377
* use Monaco's addAction instead of addCommand by @lihebi in https://github.com/codepod-io/codepod/pull/379
* fix: recursive function symbol table by @lihebi in https://github.com/codepod-io/codepod/pull/368
* mount runtime src into spawned docker container for development by @lihebi in https://github.com/codepod-io/codepod/pull/380
* [Feat] Add LaTeX syntax support for math in notes by @li-xin-yi in https://github.com/codepod-io/codepod/pull/382
* fix: add .dev tlds for link; remove /table slash cmd by @lihebi in https://github.com/codepod-io/codepod/pull/385
* add a toolbar with edit & open buttons when user clicks on a link by @lihebi in https://github.com/codepod-io/codepod/pull/386
* contextual zoom font size adjustment by @chimmyten in https://github.com/codepod-io/codepod/pull/376
* fix: node height changing bug caused by border by @lihebi in https://github.com/codepod-io/codepod/pull/387
* make newpod buttons non-overlap with editor by @lihebi in https://github.com/codepod-io/codepod/pull/388
* fix link toolbar lag by @lihebi in https://github.com/codepod-io/codepod/pull/389
* add markdown link input rules for Rich editor by @lihebi in https://github.com/codepod-io/codepod/pull/390
* chore: make wysiwyg plugins explicit by @lihebi in https://github.com/codepod-io/codepod/pull/391
* add spine to lists; add list-style for nested <ol> by @lihebi in https://github.com/codepod-io/codepod/pull/392
* refactor: Remirror link extension by @lihebi in https://github.com/codepod-io/codepod/pull/393
* fix: kebab-case sx property error by @lihebi in https://github.com/codepod-io/codepod/pull/394
* fix: docker spawner runtime container mount math by @lihebi in https://github.com/codepod-io/codepod/pull/395
* fix: Chinese input method in Remirror editor by @lihebi in https://github.com/codepod-io/codepod/pull/396
* fix: markdown gen place by @lihebi in https://github.com/codepod-io/codepod/pull/397
* feat: add slash command extension in Remirror by @lihebi in https://github.com/codepod-io/codepod/pull/400
* [UI] Support exporting pod stdout and result by @senwang86 in https://github.com/codepod-io/codepod/pull/399
* [UI][1/n] Edit/Command mode by @senwang86 in https://github.com/codepod-io/codepod/pull/398
* [UI] Add execution_count in Code node by @senwang86 in https://github.com/codepod-io/codepod/pull/402
* fix: do not attach guestToken when signup/login by @lihebi in https://github.com/codepod-io/codepod/pull/405
* feat: add Notion-style block editor drag handle by @lihebi in https://github.com/codepod-io/codepod/pull/406
* feat: confirmed deletion for pods and scopes by @lihebi in https://github.com/codepod-io/codepod/pull/407
* auto-change textfield size of repo title by @lihebi in https://github.com/codepod-io/codepod/pull/408
* fix: remove drag handle on leaving Rich pod by @lihebi in https://github.com/codepod-io/codepod/pull/409
* feat: add star by @lihebi in https://github.com/codepod-io/codepod/pull/416
* [UI] Jupyter notebook export patch by @senwang86 in https://github.com/codepod-io/codepod/pull/417
* feat: use popup handles to create new nodes by @lihebi in https://github.com/codepod-io/codepod/pull/421
* refactor: dashboard by @lihebi in https://github.com/codepod-io/codepod/pull/422
* [UI] make dashboard cleaner by @lihebi in https://github.com/codepod-io/codepod/pull/423
* chore: rename repos.tsx to dashboard.tsx by @lihebi in https://github.com/codepod-io/codepod/pull/424
* fix: dashboard regression: console warnings and refetchQueries by @lihebi in https://github.com/codepod-io/codepod/pull/425
* include yjs server code in api/ folder by @lihebi in https://github.com/codepod-io/codepod/pull/426
* feat: add authentication to yjs server by @lihebi in https://github.com/codepod-io/codepod/pull/428
* [UI] Edit cmd mode patch by @senwang86 in https://github.com/codepod-io/codepod/pull/431
* fix: remove anonymous guest user by @lihebi in https://github.com/codepod-io/codepod/pull/432
* fix: click away listener for add-node-handle's popper by @lihebi in https://github.com/codepod-io/codepod/pull/433
* Tool bar size adjustment when contextually zooming out by @chimmyten in https://github.com/codepod-io/codepod/pull/434
* disable portal to allow paning over handle menus by @lihebi in https://github.com/codepod-io/codepod/pull/435
* [Backend] Refactor ipynb kernel messages serialization by @senwang86 in https://github.com/codepod-io/codepod/pull/436
* [UI] Move multi-pod into a scope by @senwang86 in https://github.com/codepod-io/codepod/pull/438
* [UI] Drag-n-drop entire pod/scope by @senwang86 in https://github.com/codepod-io/codepod/pull/439
* feat: use yjs as the source-of-truth by @lihebi in https://github.com/codepod-io/codepod/pull/440
* use root YMap by @lihebi in https://github.com/codepod-io/codepod/pull/443
* fix: await bug; rootMap.set typo by @lihebi in https://github.com/codepod-io/codepod/pull/444
* fix: queue sync1 message and handle it after ydoc is loaded by @lihebi in https://github.com/codepod-io/codepod/pull/445
* UI: single click to edit when pod is selected by @lihebi in https://github.com/codepod-io/codepod/pull/447
* UI: in edit mode, hitting <ESC> will select the pod by @lihebi in https://github.com/codepod-io/codepod/pull/448
* refactor: replace doRemote... functions with useMutation by @lihebi in https://github.com/codepod-io/codepod/pull/449
* fix: compile error by @lihebi in https://github.com/codepod-io/codepod/pull/450
* remove state.pods; fix runtime & results by @lihebi in https://github.com/codepod-io/codepod/pull/451
* simplify copy-n-paste by @lihebi in https://github.com/codepod-io/codepod/pull/452
* feat: support cross-page pasting by @lihebi in https://github.com/codepod-io/codepod/pull/453
* set partial selection mode by @lihebi in https://github.com/codepod-io/codepod/pull/454
* feat: support copying edge by @lihebi in https://github.com/codepod-io/codepod/pull/455
* fix: remove parentnode in copying by @lihebi in https://github.com/codepod-io/codepod/pull/456
* feat: support copying scopes by @lihebi in https://github.com/codepod-io/codepod/pull/457
* [UI] Add Toc in Sidebar by @senwang86 in https://github.com/codepod-io/codepod/pull/458
* [UI] Fix ToC failure due to empty node2children by @senwang86 in https://github.com/codepod-io/codepod/pull/459
* refactor: repo store, inline utility functions by @lihebi in https://github.com/codepod-io/codepod/pull/460
* remove CursorNode, fix pod center-on-selection by @lihebi in https://github.com/codepod-io/codepod/pull/461
* refactor: remove stdout/stderr in results by @lihebi in https://github.com/codepod-io/codepod/pull/463
* fix: runtime children computation by @lihebi in https://github.com/codepod-io/codepod/pull/465
* feat: put runtime behind yjs by @lihebi in https://github.com/codepod-io/codepod/pull/466
* refactor: use pnpm workspace (monorepo) by @lihebi in https://github.com/codepod-io/codepod/pull/467
* Replace CRA with vite by @lihebi in https://github.com/codepod-io/codepod/pull/468
* chore: Vite leftover by @lihebi in https://github.com/codepod-io/codepod/pull/469
* [UI] Fix export import after pr 467 by @senwang86 in https://github.com/codepod-io/codepod/pull/470
* [Fix] Auto-completion dependencies by @li-xin-yi in https://github.com/codepod-io/codepod/pull/472
* chore: remove pnpm-locks in subdirs and run pnpm install by @lihebi in https://github.com/codepod-io/codepod/pull/473
* [docker-compose] Add setup service to install node_modules and init db by @lihebi in https://github.com/codepod-io/codepod/pull/475
* add docker volume for pnpm-store by @lihebi in https://github.com/codepod-io/codepod/pull/476
* cleanup: remove aws-sdk and related code for backend-file-export by @lihebi in https://github.com/codepod-io/codepod/pull/477
* chore: fix jest dep; remove deprecated test by @lihebi in https://github.com/codepod-io/codepod/pull/478
* chore: support String.replaceAll in tsconfig for linting by @lihebi in https://github.com/codepod-io/codepod/pull/479
* refactor: move prisma to a package by @lihebi in https://github.com/codepod-io/codepod/pull/480
* refactor: move yjs out of api into an app by @lihebi in https://github.com/codepod-io/codepod/pull/481
* cleanup: prune unused packages with depcheck by @lihebi in https://github.com/codepod-io/codepod/pull/482
* fix: observe result change to save yblob by @lihebi in https://github.com/codepod-io/codepod/pull/485
* setup: use index.ts as package's main for auto-watching by @lihebi in https://github.com/codepod-io/codepod/pull/486
* docs: move website to its standalone repo by @lihebi in https://github.com/codepod-io/codepod/pull/487
* [backend] Fix new repo error from PR 485 by @senwang86 in https://github.com/codepod-io/codepod/pull/488
* [Backend] Reduce resultMap sync frequency by @senwang86 in https://github.com/codepod-io/codepod/pull/489
* feat: add native-rendered Electron app by @lihebi in https://github.com/codepod-io/codepod/pull/491
* refactor: stand-alone spawner service; remove proxy and nginx by @lihebi in https://github.com/codepod-io/codepod/pull/493
* [Config] Add JWT_SECRET in spawner by @senwang86 in https://github.com/codepod-io/codepod/pull/494
* fix: await provider.synced before adding runtime by @lihebi in https://github.com/codepod-io/codepod/pull/496
* fix: delete runtime by @lihebi in https://github.com/codepod-io/codepod/pull/497
* add basic auth to spawner by @lihebi in https://github.com/codepod-io/codepod/pull/498
* properly update activeRuntime by @lihebi in https://github.com/codepod-io/codepod/pull/499
* clean up runtime disconnected status/UI by @lihebi in https://github.com/codepod-io/codepod/pull/500
* feat: add native runtime spawner by @lihebi in https://github.com/codepod-io/codepod/pull/501
* [UI] Update ToC when nodesMap change by @senwang86 in https://github.com/codepod-io/codepod/pull/505
* [UI] Unify export functions into one component by @senwang86 in https://github.com/codepod-io/codepod/pull/504
* add vite-checker by @lihebi in https://github.com/codepod-io/codepod/pull/508
* refactor: move apolloClient out of Zustand store by @lihebi in https://github.com/codepod-io/codepod/pull/507
* refactor: remove deprecated resolver code by @lihebi in https://github.com/codepod-io/codepod/pull/509
* Add desktop-ui initial Vite template by @lihebi in https://github.com/codepod-io/codepod/pull/510
* init file-backend by @lihebi in https://github.com/codepod-io/codepod/pull/511
* Adapt `ui/` configs to `desktop-ui/` by @lihebi in https://github.com/codepod-io/codepod/pull/512
* do not auto-jump to login page by @lihebi in https://github.com/codepod-io/codepod/pull/513
* add codepod app to desktop-ui by @lihebi in https://github.com/codepod-io/codepod/pull/514
* chore: rename desktop-ui to ui-desktop by @lihebi in https://github.com/codepod-io/codepod/pull/515
* add ui-web by @lihebi in https://github.com/codepod-io/codepod/pull/516
* chore: print info when setup finishes by @lihebi in https://github.com/codepod-io/codepod/pull/517
* remove codeium related code by @lihebi in https://github.com/codepod-io/codepod/pull/519
* Make all treeview items expanded. Disable toggle. by @lihebi in https://github.com/codepod-io/codepod/pull/520
* refactor: header and sidebar data passing logic by @lihebi in https://github.com/codepod-io/codepod/pull/521
* move user auth into only ui-web by @lihebi in https://github.com/codepod-io/codepod/pull/524
* chore: move @codepod/ui to packages/ folder by @lihebi in https://github.com/codepod-io/codepod/pull/525
* chore: rename folder into web- and desktop- prefix by @lihebi in https://github.com/codepod-io/codepod/pull/526
* [UI] add settings for sidebar position by @lihebi in https://github.com/codepod-io/codepod/pull/527
* fix: yjs container name by @lihebi in https://github.com/codepod-io/codepod/pull/528
* chore: remove nginx conf by @lihebi in https://github.com/codepod-io/codepod/pull/529
* refactor: use y-websocket.js from @codepod/ui by @lihebi in https://github.com/codepod-io/codepod/pull/530
* refactor: extract out bindState and writeState by @lihebi in https://github.com/codepod-io/codepod/pull/531
* fix: profile button by @lihebi in https://github.com/codepod-io/codepod/pull/533
* better typing for getNodesMap by @lihebi in https://github.com/codepod-io/codepod/pull/534
* move Yjs into package (conflict resolved) by @lihebi in https://github.com/codepod-io/codepod/pull/535
* fix: remove dotenv by @lihebi in https://github.com/codepod-io/codepod/pull/537
* add desktop-yjs by @lihebi in https://github.com/codepod-io/codepod/pull/539
* split dashboard user loading for web and desktop by @lihebi in https://github.com/codepod-io/codepod/pull/540
* implement desktop api file-backend saving by @lihebi in https://github.com/codepod-io/codepod/pull/541
* functional refactor & fix: remove state.role by @lihebi in https://github.com/codepod-io/codepod/pull/542
* move yjs observers to provider.once("synced") by @lihebi in https://github.com/codepod-io/codepod/pull/543
* use NodeResizeControl for pod resizing by @lihebi in https://github.com/codepod-io/codepod/pull/545
* refactor: useStore! instead of checking for null by @lihebi in https://github.com/codepod-io/codepod/pull/546
* [desktop] save repo meta and yjsblob into desktop-var-codepod volume by @lihebi in https://github.com/codepod-io/codepod/pull/547
* [desktop] make star/unstar work by @lihebi in https://github.com/codepod-io/codepod/pull/548
* fix: handle useMe null; add typing to useMe by @lihebi in https://github.com/codepod-io/codepod/pull/549
* allow read-only access to YDoc to anonymous users by @lihebi in https://github.com/codepod-io/codepod/pull/550
* fix: support editor view mode; sync on new pods by @lihebi in https://github.com/codepod-io/codepod/pull/551
* refactor: move desktop related containers into compose/desktop by @lihebi in https://github.com/codepod-io/codepod/pull/552
* refactor: rename compose/dev to compose/web by @lihebi in https://github.com/codepod-io/codepod/pull/553
* chore: cleanup console log by @lihebi in https://github.com/codepod-io/codepod/pull/554
* replace pnpm with bun by @lihebi in https://github.com/codepod-io/codepod/pull/555
* fix reactflow to 11.8 by @lihebi in https://github.com/codepod-io/codepod/pull/557
* add bun's yarn.lock to git by @lihebi in https://github.com/codepod-io/codepod/pull/559
* major refactor: on switching to a local cmd app by @lihebi in https://github.com/codepod-io/codepod/pull/560
* cleanup: remove web-app related code by @lihebi in https://github.com/codepod-io/codepod/pull/562
* refactor: rename app into apps/ui app/api folder by @lihebi in https://github.com/codepod-io/codepod/pull/563
* chore: depcheck by @lihebi in https://github.com/codepod-io/codepod/pull/564
* make codepod (cli) support /path/to/repo; publish codepod to npm by @lihebi in https://github.com/codepod-io/codepod/pull/565
* fix & enable spawner in desktop app; use trpc by @lihebi in https://github.com/codepod-io/codepod/pull/566
* refactor: inline runtime & yjs packages by @lihebi in https://github.com/codepod-io/codepod/pull/567
* cleanup: folder structure by @lihebi in https://github.com/codepod-io/codepod/pull/568
* fix: use workspace (back) to fix yjs version error by @lihebi in https://github.com/codepod-io/codepod/pull/569
* refactor: restructure `api/` folder inner files by @lihebi in https://github.com/codepod-io/codepod/pull/570
* fix npm cli; parameterize yjs port in trpc router by @lihebi in https://github.com/codepod-io/codepod/pull/571
* save a plain version of yjs content by @lihebi in https://github.com/codepod-io/codepod/pull/572
* add CI for npm build & publish by @lihebi in https://github.com/codepod-io/codepod/pull/573
* add registry-url by @lihebi in https://github.com/codepod-io/codepod/pull/574

## New Contributors
* @forrestbao made their first contribution in https://github.com/codepod-io/codepod/pull/320
* @chimmyten made their first contribution in https://github.com/codepod-io/codepod/pull/329
* @senwang86 made their first contribution in https://github.com/codepod-io/codepod/pull/341
* @sumtsui made their first contribution in https://github.com/codepod-io/codepod/pull/353

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/codepod-io/codepod/compare/v0.4.12...v0.4.13

result.name: v0.4.12: At JupyterCon 2023: auto-shrink; run-chain; geo-based execution; allow anonymous user; clean UI with everything hided; d3-force based auto-layout; rich text features: link, image, table, yjs, slash command; persist execution results; snapping; parser fixes; recursive exports; lexical scoping; scoped class; contextual zoom; export svg
result.description:
## What's Changed
* add run-norewrite button by @lihebi in https://github.com/codepod-io/codepod/pull/229
* fix ResultBlock's setLayout button regression bug by @lihebi in https://github.com/codepod-io/codepod/pull/230
* Fix (better drag-n-drop): Scope Handler & Scope right-click Menu for adding new nodes by @li-xin-yi in https://github.com/codepod-io/codepod/pull/232
* fix floating toolbar anchorEl warning by @lihebi in https://github.com/codepod-io/codepod/pull/233
* use floating toolbar in scope pod by @lihebi in https://github.com/codepod-io/codepod/pull/234
* proper scope highlighting by @lihebi in https://github.com/codepod-io/codepod/pull/235
* feat: add auto shrink by @lihebi in https://github.com/codepod-io/codepod/pull/236
* add scope's width and height in debug mode by @lihebi in https://github.com/codepod-io/codepod/pull/237
* fix: delete user repo data before deleting a repo by @lihebi in https://github.com/codepod-io/codepod/pull/238
* feat: add run-chain to run a chain of pods by @lihebi in https://github.com/codepod-io/codepod/pull/239
* feat: geographical order based scope execution by @lihebi in https://github.com/codepod-io/codepod/pull/240
* refactor: node type CODE, SCOPE, RICH in front-end by @lihebi in https://github.com/codepod-io/codepod/pull/241
* feat: add anonymous Guest user by @lihebi in https://github.com/codepod-io/codepod/pull/242
* chore: adjust wording by @lihebi in https://github.com/codepod-io/codepod/pull/243
* feat: auto hide edge handles by @lihebi in https://github.com/codepod-io/codepod/pull/244
* feat: add d3-force to push away overlapped pods by @lihebi in https://github.com/codepod-io/codepod/pull/245
* feat: add auto-run setting for auto-layout by @lihebi in https://github.com/codepod-io/codepod/pull/246
* auto hide resize handles for code and rich pods by @lihebi in https://github.com/codepod-io/codepod/pull/247
* feat: add drag handles; remove Remirror's scrollbar by @lihebi in https://github.com/codepod-io/codepod/pull/248
* fix: cannot delete repos shared with others by @lihebi in https://github.com/codepod-io/codepod/pull/249
* add isGuest field and make guest userId the same format as registered users by @lihebi in https://github.com/codepod-io/codepod/pull/250

* set autorun-layout setting default to false by @lihebi in https://github.com/codepod-io/codepod/pull/252

* show `cursor: grab` only on drag handle by @lihebi in https://github.com/codepod-io/codepod/pull/254
* fix: remirror emotion error by @lihebi in https://github.com/codepod-io/codepod/pull/256

* use remirror image extension by @lihebi in https://github.com/codepod-io/codepod/pull/258
* fix: getAuthHeaders typing by @lihebi in https://github.com/codepod-io/codepod/pull/259

* fix: check undefined nodes in compileXXX functions by @lihebi in https://github.com/codepod-io/codepod/pull/269
* use rectangle collision in d3-force auto layout by @lihebi in https://github.com/codepod-io/codepod/pull/270

* fix YMap import by @lihebi in https://github.com/codepod-io/codepod/pull/272

result.name: v0.3.0: Back to webapp.
result.description: Drop electron support, and revert to webapp.

result.name: v0.2.1: handle python's symbol table manually
result.description: Python's eval and exec turn out not to be possible to handle namespaces. Thus, the namespace is handled manually using symbol tables. This fixes the problem of previous version where a python function cannot see other functions in the same namespace. Also, now for python, the re-definition of a pod will update all its uses; utility pods are also correctly handled for python.

result.name: v0.2.0: magic commands `@export` and `@reexport`
result.description:
The following two magic commands can be used at the start of the pod to declare exports:
- `@export foo`: export to parent
-  `@reexport foo`: export a child deck's exported `foo` further up

Previous UI-based exports are now disabled.

E.g.

```py
@export foo
def foo():
    return 1+2
```

result.name: v0.1.4: fix python 3.6
result.description:
- remove ast.unparse dependence
- fix remote runtime add button

result.name: v0.1.3: Support remote runtime
result.description:
- switch from chakra and mui@v4 to mui@v5
- add remote runtime with RabbitMQ support

result.name: v0.1.2: Support Python Powerruns
result.description:
- cheaper procedure to compute pod dirty status to speed up code execution
- add double-click-to-edit
- add repo config
- support python powerruns

result.name: v0.1.1
result.description:
- support python prior to 3.9
- fix addPod/pastePod/deletePod order issues

result.name: v0.1.0: The first CodePod Electron App
result.description:
## What's Changed
* Electron app by @lihebi in https://github.com/lihebi/codepod/pull/1

## New Contributors
* @lihebi made their first contribution in https://github.com/lihebi/codepod/pull/1

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/lihebi/codepod/commits/v0.1.0

result.value:
You can [use CodePod online](https://app.codepod.io) without installing it
locally. To install it on your computer:

Step 1: install prerequisite: [nodejs](https://nodejs.org/en/download) runtime
and python & ipykernel:

```
brew install node # example for MacOS
pip3 install ipykernel
```

Step 2: Install codepod CLI app from [npm registry](https://www.npmjs.com/package/codepod):

```
> npm install -g codepod
> codepod --version
# 0.0.7
```

Step 3: launch CodePod from terminal:

```
> codepod /path/to/local/repo
# ... 🚀 Server ready at http://localhost:4001
```

Open this URL in your browser to see the app. The files will be saved to the
directory `/path/to/repo/codepod.bin|json`. The `codepod.bin` is the source of
truth, and `codepod.json` is for human-readability only.

In the future, you can update the app:

```
> npm update -g codepod
```

Open two terminals. On one:
```
cd apps/api
pnpm dev
```
On the other:
```
cd apps/ui
pnpm dev
```
 
Now go to `http://localhost:3000` to see the app.

CodePod is open-source under an MIT license. Feel free to contribute to make
it better together with us. You can contribute by [creating awesome showcases](#gallery),
[reporting a bug, suggesting a feature](https://github.com/codepod-io/codepod/issues),
or submitting a pull request.
Do use [Prettier](https://prettier.io/) (e.g., [its VSCode
plugin](https://marketplace.visualstudio.com/items?itemName=esbenp.prettier-vscode))
to format your code before checking in.
